name: Magic Marble Blast 2
description:
Magic Marble Blast 2 is a new and cool marble shoot game.
Your target is to eliminate all the marbles,but don't let the chain reach the end.
How to play:
- Shoot to match colored marbles in group of 3 or more;
- More marbles, higher score;
- Create Combos to cause a chain reaction and earn more opportunities to get awarding item
